Peliculas.Sinopsis: The Guardians struggle to keep together as a team while dealing with their personal family issues, notably Star-Lord's encounter with his father the ambitious celestial being Ego.

Peliculas.Title: Cars
Peliculas.Writer: John Lasseter, Joe Ranft, Jorgen Klubien
Peliculas.Actors: Owen Wilson, Bonnie Hunt, Paul Newman
Peliculas.Plot: On the way to the biggest race of his life, a hotshot rookie race car gets stranded in a rundown town, and learns that winning isn't everything in life.
Peliculas.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. 28 wins & 34 nominations total

Peliculas.Title: The ABC Murders
Peliculas.Actors: John Malkovich, Eamon Farren, Michael Shaeffer
Peliculas.Plot: In 1933, retired detective Hercule Poirot is targeted by a taunting killer who sends letters signed "ABC", which Poirot must decode in order to discover the identity of the murderer.

Peliculas.Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Peliculas.Actors: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton
Peliculas.Plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
Peliculas.Awards: Nominated for 7 Oscars. 21 wins & 43 nominations total
